hero.headline: Stop Chasing Leads. Let Them Come to You.
hero.subheadline: Professional Google & Facebook Ads Management That Drives High-Quality Leads to Your Business

hero_image.alt: Lead generation dashboard showing successful marketing campaigns

intro.paragraph: Running a small business means you need a constant stream of qualified leads to grow. But effective lead generation is time-consuming, expensive, and requires expertise most small business owners don't have. DIY marketing wastes money on unqualified clicks. Hiring an in-house team is too expensive. That's where Capture Client's Lead Generation Services come in. We've driven over $10 million in revenue and generated 25,000+ qualified leads for businesses like yours. Our proven multi-channel approach combines expert Google Ads management, Facebook Ads strategy, AI-powered lead qualification, and conversion-optimized landing pages to deliver appointment-ready prospects. Our team handles everything—keyword research, ad creation, audience targeting, budget optimization, A/B testing, and continuous refinement. You get a predictable flow of qualified prospects without lifting a finger. We specialize in service-based businesses (HVAC, plumbing, legal, medical, home services, B2B) and understand exactly how to attract high-intent customers. Our clients see 3-5x ROI within 90 days with conversion rates averaging 15-25% from click to booked appointment. Unlike traditional agencies that charge hourly or take a percentage, we offer transparent monthly pricing with full campaign ownership and real-time dashboards. Track every lead, every dollar spent, and every conversion. Whether you need 10 leads or 1,000 per month, our proven system scales with your business. Stop guessing with your marketing budget. Let our lead generation experts put your business in front of motivated buyers ready to purchase your services.

benefits.title: Predictable Lead Flow
benefits.description: Get a steady stream of qualified leads every month. No more feast-or-famine cycles. Our campaigns are optimized to deliver consistent, reliable results you can count on.

benefits.title: Highly Qualified Leads
benefits.description: We target prospects who are actively searching for your services. Advanced audience targeting and qualification ensures you only pay for leads that match your ideal customer profile.

benefits.title: Multi-Channel Strategy
benefits.description: Reach customers everywhere they spend time online. We combine Google Search Ads, Google Display, Facebook Ads, and Instagram campaigns for maximum visibility and conversions.

benefits.title: Expert Campaign Management
benefits.description: Our certified Google Ads and Facebook Ads specialists handle everything. From keyword research to ad creative to landing page optimization—we're your full-service lead generation team.

benefits.title: Transparent ROI Tracking
benefits.description: See exactly where every dollar goes. Real-time dashboards show campaign performance, cost per lead, conversion rates, and ROI. Complete transparency with every campaign.

benefits.title: Conversion-Optimized Landing Pages
benefits.description: High-converting landing pages designed to turn clicks into customers. Mobile-optimized, fast-loading pages with compelling copy and clear calls-to-action.

how_it_works.title: Discovery & Strategy
how_it_works.description: We analyze your business, target audience, competitors, and goals. We create a custom lead generation strategy tailored to your market, budget, and objectives.

how_it_works.title: Campaign Setup & Launch
how_it_works.description: Our team builds your Google Ads and Facebook Ads campaigns from scratch. Keyword research, ad copywriting, audience targeting, tracking pixels—everything is configured for optimal performance.

how_it_works.title: Landing Page Creation
how_it_works.description: We design and build conversion-optimized landing pages specific to your campaigns. Fast-loading, mobile-friendly pages with lead capture forms integrated with your CRM.

how_it_works.title: Continuous Optimization
how_it_works.description: We don't set it and forget it. Our team continuously monitors performance, tests ad variations, adjusts bids, refines targeting, and optimizes for better results every week.

how_it_works.title: Lead Delivery & Reporting
how_it_works.description: Leads flow directly into your CRM with full tracking. Monthly reports show campaign performance, cost per lead, conversions, and ROI. Full transparency into your marketing investment.

faq.question: How much do I need to spend on ads?
faq.answer: Ad budgets vary based on your industry, location, and competition. Most of our clients invest between $1,000-$5,000 per month in ad spend, plus our management fee. We'll recommend a budget during your strategy call based on your goals and market. Our data shows that businesses investing $2,500+ monthly see the best ROI, with most achieving 3-5x return within 90 days.

faq.question: What's the difference between Google Ads and Facebook Ads?
faq.answer: Google Ads targets people actively searching for your services (high intent), resulting in 3-5x higher conversion rates. Facebook Ads targets people based on interests and demographics (awareness and nurturing), perfect for building your pipeline. We typically recommend both for maximum reach and conversions. Google captures ready-to-buy customers, while Facebook builds brand awareness and nurtures prospects.

faq.question: How many leads can I expect?
faq.answer: Lead volume depends on your budget, industry, location, and competition. Most clients see 20-100 qualified leads per month with a $2,000-$5,000 ad spend. Our average client generates 50+ leads monthly. We'll provide detailed projections during your strategy call based on market data specific to your industry.

faq.question: Do you create the ads and landing pages?
faq.answer: Yes! Our team handles everything—ad copy, creative design, landing page development, and conversion optimization. You approve the strategy and messaging, we execute everything. All landing pages are mobile-optimized, fast-loading, and designed to convert at 15-25% or higher.

faq.question: How long does it take to see results?
faq.answer: Most campaigns start generating leads within 7-14 days. Optimal performance typically develops over 30-60 days as we gather data and continuously optimize targeting, messaging, and bidding. Our fastest client generated 15 qualified leads in the first week. We recommend a 90-day commitment for best results.

faq.question: What industries do you specialize in?
faq.answer: We specialize in service-based businesses including HVAC, plumbing, electrical, legal services, medical/dental practices, home services, real estate, financial services, and B2B professional services. We've generated over 25,000 leads across 15+ industries. If you serve local or B2B customers, we can help.

faq.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer month-to-month contracts with 30 days notice. No long-term commitments required. However, we recommend at least 90 days to allow proper optimization and data gathering for maximum ROI.

faq.question: Do you provide the ad spend or do I?
faq.answer: You provide the ad spend budget. Google and Facebook bill you directly for ad costs, giving you full transparency and control. We manage the campaigns and charge a separate management fee for our services. This ensures you own your campaigns and data completely.

faq.question: What kind of ROI can I expect from lead generation?
faq.answer: Our average client sees 3-5x ROI within 90 days. For example, if you invest $3,000/month in ads plus our management fee, you should expect $9,000-$15,000+ in revenue. Many clients achieve 400%+ ROI as campaigns mature. We provide monthly reports showing exact cost per lead, conversion rates, and revenue attribution.

faq.question: How do you ensure lead quality?
faq.answer: We use advanced audience targeting, negative keyword filtering, lead scoring, and AI-powered qualification to ensure only high-intent prospects reach you. Our multi-step qualification process includes demographic targeting, behavioral signals, and automated follow-up. Average lead-to-customer conversion rate is 15-25%, significantly higher than industry standards.

cta_section.headline: Ready to Generate More Qualified Leads?
cta_section.subheadline: Book a free strategy call and discover how our lead generation services can fill your pipeline with high-quality prospects ready to buy.
